SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query

Class UsersListQuery

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query.UsersListQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceListQuery
public class UsersListQuery extends ResourceListQueryImpl
Query for the users list. The following filters can be used:
  • name
  • role
  • provider
